checkSendLimit(address,address,address).details: the goal of this function is to always return a sensible number, it's used to validate transfer throughs, and also heavily in the graph/pathfinding services

params.tokenOwner: the safe/owner that the token was minted to

returns._0: the amount of tokenowner's token src can send to dest

inflate(uint256,uint256).details: this is basically the calculation for compound interest, with some adjustments because of integer math

params._periods: the step to calculate the issuance rate as of

returns._0: initial issuance rate as if interest (inflation) has been compounded period times

issuance().details: current issuance is the initial issuance inflated by the amount of inflation periods since the hub was deployed

params._periods: the step to calculate the issuance rate at

returns._0: inflation rate as of the given period

organizationSignup().details: signup is permanent for organizations too, there's no way to unsignup

returns._0: the amount of periods since hub was deployed

pow(uint256,uint256).details: this is an implementation of exponentiation by squares

params.base: the base to be used in the calculation
params.exponent: the exponent to be used in the calculation

signup().details: signup is permanent, there's no way to unsignup

transferThrough(address[],address[],addr.details: tokenOwners[0], srcs[0], dests[0], and wads[0] constitute a transaction step

params.dests: the recipient of each transaction step
params.srcs: the sender of each transaction step
params.tokenOwners: the owner of the tokens being sent in each transaction step
params.wads: the amount for each transaction step

trust(address,uint256).details: the trust graph is weighted and directed

params.limit: the amount this user is trusted, as a percentage of 100

checkSendLimit(address,address,address).notice: finds the maximum amount of a specific token that can be sent between two users

inflate(uint256,uint256).notice: find the current issuance rate for any initial issuance and amount of periods

issuance().notice: calculates the current issuance rate per second

issuanceByStep(uint256).notice: finds the inflation rate at a given inflation period

organizationSignup().notice: register an organization address with the hub and join the trust graph

periods().notice: helper function for finding the amount of inflation periods since this hub was deployed

signup().notice: signup to this circles hub - create a circles token and join the trust graph

transferThrough(address[],address[],addr.notice: walks through tokenOwners, srcs, dests, and amounts array and executes transtive transfer

trust(address,uint256).notice: trust a user, calling this means you're able to receive tokens from this user transitively
